Translation¶

timedToData.discreteTransitions(timedNet, maximal)[source]¶

Create the transitions for discrete mode

Parameters

  • timedNet (tdpn) – a tdpn structure

  • maximal (int) – the maximal contant of timed Net

Returns

list of transitions responsible for discrete transitions

Return type

list[tuple[list[str], list[str], dict[str,dict[str,int]], dict[str,dict[str,int]]]]

timedToData.divide(trans)[source]¶

helper function to help create multiple transitions with one transition

each arc in the result is either singular or open interval of length 1

Parameters

trans (tuple[str,list[tuple[str,str,list[typing.Union[int,double]],str]],list[tuple(str,list[tuple[str,str,list[typing.Union[int,double]],str]]]) – a timed transtion

Returns

a list of arcs

Return type

tuple[str,str,list[typing.Union[int,double]]

timedToData.modifyTimedNet(timedNet)[source]¶

helper function to change the timedNet and make it suitable for translation

It will create multiple transitions from one transition by dividing each arc into separate arcs which are either singular, or represent an open interval of length 1.

Also, the arcs in each transition will be sorted

Parameters

timedNet (tdpn) – a tdpn structure

Returns

a modified timedNet

Return type

tdpn

timedToData.sortArcs(timedNet)[source]¶

Helper function to sort the arcs in every transition on the basis of their intervals

Parameters

timedNet (tdpn) – a tdpn structure

Returns

a tdpn with sorted arcs in all transitions

Return type

tdpn

timedToData.timeElapseTransitions(timedNet, maximal)[source]¶

create the transitions for time elapse mode

Creates transitions el1, el2, el3, el4

for each place p, a transition tf.p.max is created

tf.p.max transfers token with integer ages to p.inf

for each place p and each k<max transitions tf.p.k and ti.p.k are created

tf.p.k changes the value of token with integer ages to high

ti.p.k transfers token in p.k with integer ages to next place, p.k+1

Parameters

  • timedNet (tdpn) – a tdpn structure

  • maximal (int) – the maximal contant of timed Net

Returns

list of transitions and list of places responsible for time elapse

Return type

tuple[list[tuple[list[str], list[str], dict[str,dict[str,int]], dict[str,dict[str,int]]]], list[strs]]

Parameters

timedNet (tdpn) – a tdpn structure

Returns

a data net equivalent to the timedNet

Return type
